short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A sleek tab manager that helps you manage duplicate tabs effortlessly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Sync Pro

Keep your tabs organized automatically by domain - the smart way to manage your browser tabs!

Are you tired of having too many tabs open and struggling to find the right one? Tab Sync Pro is here to help! This powerful extension automatically organizes your tabs by domain, making it easy to find and manage related tabs.

FEATURES:
- Smart Domain Grouping: All tabs from the same website are automatically grouped together
- Quick Search: Find any open tab instantly with the search function
- Batch Actions: Close all tabs from the same domain with one click
- Clean Interface: Simple and easy to navigate design
- Domain Statistics: See how many tabs you have open per domain
- Keyboard Navigation: Full keyboard support for power users
- Privacy Focused: Works completely in your browser - no data collection

PERFECT FOR:
- Professionals managing multiple work tabs
- Students researching across different websites
- Anyone who wants to keep their browser organized
- Users who frequently work with multiple websites

HOW IT HELPS:
- Find specific tabs quickly
- Reduce browser clutter
- Work more efficiently
- Manage browser memory better
- Keep your tabs organized

MAIN FEATURES:
1. Domain Groups
- Groups expand and collapse for easy viewing
- See total number of tabs per domain
- Quick access to all website tabs

2. Tab Management
- Switch between tabs with one click
- Close tabs individually or in groups
- See website icons for easy recognition
- View URL paths for better context

3. Smart Search
- Filter tabs as you type
- Search across all domains and titles
- Groups automatically expand when matching
- Navigate with keyboard

4. Easy to Use
- Simple, clean design
- Smooth transitions
- Works instantly
- Light on system resources

TECHNICAL INFO:
- Works with Chrome version 88 or higher
- Compatible with Windows, Mac, and Linux
- Minimal permissions required
- No account or login needed

Privacy Notice:
Tab Sync Pro values your privacy. We don't collect, store, or send any of your browsing data. Everything happens right in your browser.

SUPPORT:
Need help? Have suggestions? Contact us through the Chrome Web Store support section.

Try Tab Sync Pro today and take control of your tabs! Join other users who have discovered a better way to manage their browser.

Note: Regular updates and improvements based on user feedback.
